alert.note: Alert for City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 2:30PM EDT until July 19 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND EASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES... THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hunterdale, or over Franklin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Sedley around 235 PM EDT. Carrsville around 240 PM EDT. Windsor, Ivor and Zuni around 310 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Handsom, Berlin, Indika, Whitley, Collosse, Sunbeam, Lees Mill, Riverdale, Walters and Boaz. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton
